game.name: Tile Trials
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Tile Trials is a tile-placing, number based puzzle game for the casual strategist. Place a variety of familiar shapes onto increasingly difficult layouts to maximize your score and surpass each level threshold. Iterative gameplay, mind bending challenges, and hand-crafted puzzles await!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tile Trials is a tile-placing, number based puzzle game for the casual strategist. Place a variety of familiar shapes onto increasingly difficult layouts to maximize your score and surpass each level threshold. Iterative gameplay, mind bending challenges, and hand-crafted puzzles await!
